content: **drops crochet shawl in alpaca and vivaldi or alpaca and brushed alpaca silk ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **measurements** width top approx 150 cm / 59 length center back approx 75 cm / 29 5 **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio 100 g colour no 6347 grey lilac and use drops vivaldi from garnstudio 150 g colour no 24 light lilac or use drops alpaca from garnstudio 100 g colour no 6347 grey lilac and use drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio 150 g colour no 17 light lavender drops crochet hook size 6 / us j or the size needle to obtain the correct gauge crochet gauge 1 diamond should measure 15 x 15 cm / 6 x 6 diagonal 21 cm / 8 25
